statements: SELECT * FROM clinical_trials_data WHERE status = 'Ongoing';
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM clinical_trials_data WHERE compliance_score > 0.8 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT trial_name, patient_id FROM clinical_trials_data WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT AVG(compliance_score) AS average_compliance_score FROM clinical_trials_data WHERE status = 'Completed';
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, compliance_score FROM clinical_trials_data WHERE compliance_score < 0.5 ORDER BY compliance_score;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials_data WHERE status = 'Completed';
SELECT trial_id, trial_name FROM clinical_trials_data WHERE compliance_score >= 5 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM clinical_trials_data WHERE status = 'Ongoing' ORDER BY trial_id ASC;
SELECT patient_id, trial_name, compliance_score FROM clinical_trials_data WHERE compliance_score < 7 AND status = 'Terminated';
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, start_date, end_date, compliance_score FROM clinical_trials_data WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Trials;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM Trials WHERE sponsor_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM Trials WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Trials
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM Trials
SELECT trial_name, sponsor_name FROM Trials WHERE sponsor_name IS NOT NULL
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM Trials ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender='Female'
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM trials WHERE status = 'ongoing';
SELECT participant_name, enrollment_date, completion_date FROM trial_participants WHERE completion_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_name, gender, phone_number FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, phone_number FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM trials WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM trial_participants INNER JOIN trials ON trial_participants.trial_id = trials.trial_id;
SELECT participant_name, enrollment_date, completion_date FROM trial_participants WHERE trial_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, dob, gender FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT trial_name, lead_researcher, start_date, end_date FROM trials ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, medication, dosage FROM treatments WHERE treatment_id < 5;
SELECT trial_name, COUNT(visit_id) AS num_visits FROM trials LEFT JOIN visits ON trials.trial_id = visits.trial_id GROUP BY trial_name ORDER BY num_visits DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, dob FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 3 ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT trial_name, lead_researcher FROM trials WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trial_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM visits WHERE visit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, address FROM patients JOIN visits ON patients.patient_id = visits.patient_id WHERE visits.trial_id = 5 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT participant_name, age FROM participants WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT study_name, start_date, end_date FROM studies ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT site_name, location FROM sites WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT treatment_name, dosage, side_effects FROM treatments WHERE dosage > '50mg';
SELECT participant_name, age, gender FROM participants ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT study_name, start_date, end_date FROM studies WHERE lead_researcher='John Doe';
SELECT site_name, location, contact_person FROM sites WHERE location='New York';
SELECT treatment_name, dosage, side_effects FROM treatments ORDER BY treatment_name;
SELECT participant_name, value, measurement_date FROM participants JOIN measurements ON participants.participant_id = measurements.participant_id ORDER BY value DESC;
